collectible.title: Nagamimi Plush
collectible.subtitle: A plush toy of Nagamimi's original form.
collectible.text: A plush toy depicting Nagamimi's original form. Plays one of over 700+ custom insults when squeezed!

collectible.title: Nagamimi's hat
collectible.subtitle: A hat worn by an "Almighty" life form.
collectible.text: A hat worn by a "mega-cute Nagamimi type" life form. It's a little small, so it tends to slip off easily.
collectible.unlock: Play through 7 games with Nagamimi and 3 other characters with the "mean" tag.
